first_translate: “my lady, I would like to invite you...

second_translate: please attend if you have time...
label: "please join us if you can,"

second_translate: ...lady heather adens.

second_translate: isn’t this...
label: hm

hangle: 어제 시그렌이랑 일이 있었던 그 영애 아냐?
first_translate: ...the lady who had an incident with siegren yesterday?
second_translate: ...the lady who had an incident with siegren yesterday?

hangle: 그런 사람이 여는 티파티에 내가 가도 되는 건가?
first_translate: is it okay for me to attend her tea party?
second_translate: Is it okay if I attend a tea party hosted by someone like her?
label: would it be a good idea to go to her tea party?

hangle: 내가 괜히 신경 쓸 만한 이유는 없지.
first_translate: well, I don’t see why not.
second_translate: I don’t have any reason to worry about it.
label: I guess there's no reason for me to worry about that.

first_translate: she’s the one who did something wrong.
second_translate: She’s the one who did something wrong.
label: besides, she's the one that acted out of line.

hangle: 어쩌면 티파티에서 유니스를 만날 수 있을지도 모르니까.
first_translate: and I might be able to see eunice at the tea party.
second_translate: and I might be able to see Eunice at the tea party.
label: I might even get to meet eunice at the tea party.

first_translate: tell her I will gladly attend.

label: please tell her I'll gladly attend.

second_translate: lady eunice.
label: lady eunice!

second_translate: lady fiona!
label: lady fiona!

first_translate: were you invited to the tea party as well?
second_translate: Did someone invite Lady Eunice to the tea party as well?
label: did you get an invitation too, lady eunice?

second_translate: Yes.
label: yes.

hangle: 피오나 영애와는 같은 일행임에도 계속 얼굴을 볼 수가 없었네요.
first_translate: we’re traveling together, but I haven’t been able to see you.
second_translate: I was in the same group as Lady Fiona, but I kept missing her.
label: I haven't been able to see you even though we're traveling in the same group.

second_translate: I was riding a horse.
label: that's because I was on horseback.

first_translate: please come ride in the carriage with me.
second_translate: please come ride in the carriage with me.
label: you should come visit me in my carriage sometime.

second_translate: it’s boring by myself...
label: it can get quite boring being alone...

hangle: 주변에 온통 기사랑 병사라서 쓸쓸했나 봐.
first_translate: she must have felt lonely with all the knights and soldiers around her.

second_translate: Welcome. Please come in.

first_translate: thank you for accepting my invitation.

second_translate: I’ve been waiting for you.
label: I've been waiting for you.

second_translate: Wow, she really is a stunning beauty.

first_translate: she’s the one who tried to get close to siegren.

second_translate: please, have a seat.
label: please have a seat.

second_translate: Yes, thank you.
label: thank you.

first_translate: these are ladies from nearby territories.
second_translate: These are ladies from nearby territories.

hangle: 명성이 자자한 두 분을 만나서 영광이에요.

second_translate: yes...
label: thank you...

label: what is this?

first_translate: I feel like they’re giving me strange looks...
second_translate: I feel like they’re giving me strange looks...
label: there's something unwholesome in her gaze...

first_translate: I heard you were in the north, lady fiona.
second_translate: I heard you were in the north, Lady Fiona.
label: I heard you're from the north, lady heylon.

second_translate: That’s right.
label: that's right.

second_translate: Did you have a hard time?
label: wasn't it hard living there?

hangle: 거기에는 굉장히 야만적이고 잔혹한 마법사가 산다고 들었는데….
first_translate: I heard a very brutal and cruel sorcerer lives there...
second_translate: I heard a very brutal and cruel sorcerer lives there...

first_translate: it’s just like any other place where people live.
second_translate: It's just like any other place where people live.

first_translate: wait, that rumor spread all the way here?!
second_translate: wait, that rumor spread all the way here?!

second_translate: speaking of rumors,
label: speaking of rumors,

second_translate: I heard...
label: I hear...

second_translate: ...you have a special bloodline.
label: ...you have a rather peculiar family history, lady fiona.

first_translate: I heard you’re not originally from house hylon.
second_translate: I heard you’re not originally from House Hylon.

second_translate: I know that, as far as I'm aware.
label: from what I know,

second_translate: They say you're an illegitimate child.
label: you're an illegitimate child.

second_translate: Yes, that's true.
label: yes, that's true.

second_translate: I am an illegitimate child.
label: I am an illegitimate child.

second_translate: You are exactly right.
label: you’re absolutely right.

second_translate: Are you smiling?
label: is she smiling?

second_translate: and your birth family...
label: also, your original family was--

hangle: 네. 마약 사업 혐의로 재산을 몰수당했죠.
first_translate: yes, their wealth was confiscated for drug trafficking.
second_translate: The authorities confiscated their wealth for drug trafficking.
label: yes, they had all their wealth seized and were charged with drug smuggling,

first_translate: I was the one who reported them.

label: and I'm the one who reported them.

first_translate: my goodness, I could never do that.
second_translate: My goodness, I could never do that.
label: my goodness, I could never do such a thing.

first_translate: betraying your own family for any reason...
second_translate: betraying your own family for any reason...
label: betraying one's own family for whatever reason is...

first_translate: ...is something only a beast would do.

second_translate: Please wait a moment.

first_translate: I’m telling you to know your place!
second_translate: I'm telling you to stop. You're going too far.

first_translate: even if you were lucky enough to be adopted,

label: so...

second_translate: siegren.
label: siegren.

first_translate: why are you looking elsewhere, lady fiona?
second_translate: Lady Fiona, why are you looking away?
label: lady fiona, what are you looking at?

hangle: 지금 제가 말하고 있는 게 안 보이나요?
first_translate: can’t you see I’m talking to you?

label: can't you see I'm talking to you?

first_translate: I still have more to say.
second_translate: I still have more to say.
label: I haven’t finished speaking.

second_translate: you...
label: lady fiona,

hangle: 남의 저택에서 신세를 지고 있는 와중에 전하께 꼬리를 치셨죠?

second_translate: ...tried to seduce his highness while staying at someone else’s manor, didn’t you?
label: you tried to seduce his highness while he was spending the night at our manor, didn't you?

first_translate: my maid told me about last night--

label: my personal maid told me that last night, you--

second_translate: Wait.

label: what’s absurd about it?

second_translate: I'm just stating the facts.

second_translate: Aah!
label: ah...

second_translate: Aaaaah!
label: aaaah!

second_translate: I agree with everything the lady said.
label: you’re right about everything, lady heather.

hangle: 전 사생아고, 제가 태어난 가문도 직접 부수었죠.
first_translate: I’m an illegitimate child, and I destroyed the family I was born into.
second_translate: I’m an illegitimate child, and I destroyed the family I was born into.
label: I am an illegitimate child, and I personally ruined my family.

hangle: 하지만 똑똑한 아덴 영애가 하나 파악하지 못한 게 있네요.
first_translate: but there’s one thing you didn’t realize, lady heather.
second_translate: But clever Lady Aden failed to notice one thing.
label: but there's one thing that someone as bright as you hasn’t figured out yet.

first_translate: thanks to that, I now have both power...
second_translate: thanks to that, I now have both power...
label: thanks to all those things, I now possess...

second_translate: ...and authority.
label: ...both power and strength.

hangle: 지금 이 자리에서 제가 영애의 머리카락을 불태워도
first_translate: even if I burn your hair right now,
second_translate: Even if I burn your hair right here and now,
label: I could set your hair on fire right here and now,

hangle: 아덴 자작님은 제 아버지께 항의서 몇 장 보내는 게 고작일 거란 뜻이죠.
first_translate: the most your father could do is send a few letters of complaint to my father.
second_translate: Baron Aden could only send a few letters of complaint to my father.
label: and all viscount ardel could do is write a few letters of complaint to my father.

hangle: 망아지처럼 구는 것도 상대를 보면서 하세요.
first_translate: know who you’re dealing with before you act like a brat.

label: also...

label: your...

label: ...highness...

second_translate: It seems like the tea party is quite enjoyable.

second_translate: Lady Heather Aden.
label: lady heather,

hangle: 어제 그런 일이 있었으니 고개를 못 들겠지.
first_translate: she probably can’t look at him after what happened yesterday.
second_translate: She probably can't even lift her head after what happened yesterday.
label: I'm sure she can't look him in the eye after what she did last night.

first_translate: let me give you one last piece of advice.
second_translate: Let me give you one last piece of advice.

second_translate: Don’t covet someone else’s man.
